title: Watch Dogs Legion Leaks - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.04.19
description:
Start your trial month for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Get 74% off the Father's Day Steak fix gift package at http://omahasteaks.com and enter code: KFGAMES in the search bar.

E3 is starting early! Andrea and Greg talk about the rumors about Watch Dogs Legion, Apple supporting PS4 and Xbox controllers, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:02:39 - Housekeeping
Kinda Funny Games E3 Showcase - Monday, June 10th @ 4:30 p.m. PT 60+ indie games. youtube.com/kindfunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:03:45 - Watch Dogs Legion Leaks
00:12:12 - Apple Announces PS4/Xbox One Controller Support
00:19:52 - Starbreeze Layoffs
00:23:09 - PS Plus Prices Rising Globally
00:32:33 - Xbox Deodorant/Body Spray/Shower Gel on their way
00:34:18 - Out today
00:37:44 - Destiny 2 Breaking News
00:42:11 -  Hims
00:43:20 - Omaha Steaks
Reader mail   -
00:45:42 - “In regards to yesterday’s talk about Fallout 76…” - Andy Prince
00:49:20 - “What do you think the chances are of it just coming to Game Pass?” - Saucy Biscuit
00:53:13 - “What is your advice for attending E3 for first timers?” - Steve Saylor
00:58:08 - “What has been the biggest bit of news you have been told but haven’t been able to talk about?” - One Man Tag Team
01:06:59 - Squad Up: Jeffrey P Long - Xbox - Jeffrey P Long
01:08:26 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta
